verbs.description: Five months after [ARG0: a D.C. jury] [V: acquitted] [ARG1: six protesters charged with rioting on the day President Donald Trump was sworn into office] , prosecutors ' opening statements in a second trial presented a new theme : The four protesters now on trial played active roles in the destruction and were not simply bystanders in black .
